Plot: The increased gap between the rich and the poor, economic instability, greed, resources dwindling for those on the bottom, mindless citizens, the addiction for war, the inability to invest ...
Title: Prophecy to Laos
Director: Jd Adamopolous, Jay Costa, Jason Michael Downing, Brendan Teglia
Actors: Jd Adamopolous, Paul Dowdakin, Jason Michael Downing, Stephen Faust
